=== Reputation and Synergy Coordination System ===

--- Step 1: Building Reputation ---
Alice Score: 0.98

--- Step 2: Negotiation Weighting (Synergy) ---
Synergy Multiplier (Alice-Bob): 1.09
Alice Offer with 14% ROI (15% req): ACCEPTED
Result: Accepted because synergy lowered the ROI threshold to ~13.7%.

--- Step 3: Trust Thresholds ---
Malory ($400k offer) Result: REJECTED
Reason: Reputation score 0.05 is below required threshold 0.44 for this transaction.
Alice ($400k offer) Result: ACCEPTED

--- Step 4: Commitment Validation ---
Malory (Score: 0.16) Commitment (No Escrow): REJECTED
Reason: Reputation score 0.16 is below required threshold 0.40 for this transaction.
Malory Commitment (With Escrow): REJECTED
